content: Although my focus is on backend, most of my professional experience has been as a {{full-stack}} developer.
I also enjoy programming low level stuff, like {{C}} and tinkering with {{electronics}}.
Another great interest of mine is {{UX design}}, that I like to approach in a broader sense and not only through user interfaces.
I'm a {{passionate}} developer, always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn.
Feel free to connect on LinkedIn or check out my work on GitHub
You can find my resumÃ© over here => resumÃ© <printable version>

You can also {{navigate}} through the sections using the {{arrow keys}} or {{Vim motions}}.
